long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WisherBag: Your Ultimate Wishlist & Shopping Assistant

Shop Smarter and Save Money with WisherBag! Easily manage your Wishlist, track product prices, and stay updated with price drop alerts, deals, stock updates, and more from top e-commerce stores—all in one place.

WisherBag helps you shop smarter by finding the best prices on e-commerce websites.
With features like price comparison, personalized price drop alerts, intuitive price graphs, and curated deals, WisherBag ensures you never miss out on a great deal.

Shop confidently, knowing you're getting the best value for your favorite products. WisherBag makes your shopping experience effortless, rewarding, and hassle-free.

✨ Unified Wishlist - Save Everything You Love in One Place
Not ready to buy yet? Save it for later with WisherBag’s browser extension. Create a unified Wishlist across top online shopping stores like Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, Nykaa, Tatacliq and more. With WisherBag, you can save, organize, and track the items you love from any website—all in one place.

✨ Organize Your Wishlist with WishTags
Plan your shopping effortlessly with WisherBag's WishTags. Categorize and label your Wishlist items to keep track of what you need and when you want to buy it. Create personalized shopping lists, prioritize your purchases, and stay organized for a seamless shopping experience.

✨ Stay Ahead with Real-Time Price Alerts & Stock Alerts
Never miss a deal with WisherBag’s advanced tracking technology. Get instant alerts when prices drop or when an item is back in stock, so you can buy at the perfect time.

✨ Watch Price Alerts
Keep track of prices for your favorite items! If the price is too high, WisherBag will notify you as soon as it drops. Receive alerts via email, website, or mobile app push notifications and never miss a great deal again.

✨ Price Graphs & Trends
Access detailed product price history through intuitive price graphs for any item across e-commerce websites. Spot trends, analyze patterns, and discover the best time to make your purchase effortlessly.

✨ Compare Prices for The Best Deal
With WisherBag’s smart search, compare prices across multiple stores in just one click. Use our price comparison feature to discover deals, ensure you're getting the best value, and make confident shopping decisions.
